results.content: Good and informative.  I had some problems with my recreated code rendering like the video, so I need to back through it to find the problems.

results.content: Creating the code from scratch is good.  You learn more this way.  But be sure to check your syntax.  Otherwise you may have to repeat some code steps that you may have mis-typed.
results.content_html: Creating the code from scratch is good. You learn more this way. But be sure to check your syntax. Otherwise you may have to repeat some code steps that you may have mis-typed.

results.content: He teaches SASS in a very real world use for it.  And you come away with tools you can use going forward.
results.content_html: He teaches SASS in a very real world use for it. And you come away with tools you can use going forward.

results.content: Great course with highly useable buttons for future use. I felt like this course was the perfect length. Clear, professional video. Exactly what I needed. Perfect!
results.content_html: Great course with highly useable buttons for future use. I felt like this course was the perfect length. Clear, professional video. Exactly what I needed. Perfect!

results.content: I had already done a SASS course, but it was a while back. Used this course as a review to reacquaint myself with the language and everything was explained perfectly. Even learned some new things from it. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to learn how to write CSS with SASS.

results.content: Another great course from Sebastian, this course is packed with information.  I did not really know much about Sass before taking this course.  But know I have some solid understanding how this work and how Sass can help me increase productivity.
